summary: Defines a CupertinoTimerPicker UI control for the Flet Python SDK, enabling users to select a countdown duration via hour, minute, and second spinners styled after iOS, with customizable alignment, colors, intervals, and operation mode.
business_intent: Offer developers a ready-to-use, iOS‑styled timer picker component that can be easily integrated into cross‑platform applications built with Flet, simplifying the implementation of countdown duration selection interfaces.
